logo.alt: CoinShift logo, featuring a stylized coin with a currency exchange symbol, representing the currency converter application

flags.alt: American flag, featuring thirteen horizontal red and white stripes with a blue canton containing fifty white stars, representing the United States.
European Union flag, featuring a circle of twelve gold stars on a blue background, representing the unity of European countries.
Russian flag, featuring three horizontal stripes of white, blue, and red, representing the Russian Federation.
